actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to designate April 15 of each year as Holocaust Remembrance Day.

summary.text: Designates April 15 of each year as "Holocaust Remembrance Day". Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation each year calling for the observance of such day with appropriate ceremonies.

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate April 15 of each year as Holocaust Remembrance Day.
